channel.title: CVE Feed for Dogecoin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dogecoin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-30769|2023-04-17T00:00:00 -- dogecoin -- node
item.description: Vulnerability discovered is related to the peer-to-peer (p2p) communications, attackers can craft consensus messages, send it to individual nodes and take them offline. An attacker can crawl the network peers using getaddr message and attack the unpatched nodes.
